channel.title: MASKS: As Gods Rise
channel.description:
![woman-4585956_1280|500x500](upload://xvlgEiyYAUoMasMguuXShzvin8u.jpeg)
This session is scheduled for 3 hours. The session will be recorded if everyone is cool with it! If not, no worries. We will be using Streamyard.
Being able to attend all sessions would be ideal, but is not required! You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
***Young heroes have so much to prove in Halcyon City. To make their own mark on their world, they must come face to face with who they truly are, and who they want to be. But what if a sleeping god wakes up inside them? What then?***
***Will our heroes rise to the mythic stories in their soul? Or will they forge a new path entirely of their own making?***
**Safety tools**: We will be using script change, lines and veils, and an open door policy. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best. This game follows [The Gauntlet's Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
Art is by [Pretty Sleepy Arts](https://pixabay.com/users/prettysleepy1-2855492/).
**Session 1**: [date=2020-01-05 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lu32OuFQSQRL51cNz56
**Session 2** [date=2020-01-12 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lu32iGXIPSdjdJoaawG
**Session 3** [date=2020-01-19 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lu32yxC8W_o8pj4DYI0
**Session 4** [date=2020-01-26 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lu33AWogSpTVLbWRGaT

item.title: MASKS: As Gods Rise
item.dc:creator: @swordqueen
item.description:
@swordqueen wrote:

woman-4585956_12801280×1280 464 KB

This session is scheduled for 3 hours. The session will be recorded if everyone is cool with it! If not, no worries. We will be using Streamyard.

Being able to attend all sessions would be ideal, but is not required! You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.

Young heroes have so much to prove in Halcyon City. To make their own mark on their world, they must come face to face with who they truly are, and who they want to be. But what if a sleeping god wakes up inside them? What then?

Will our heroes rise to the mythic stories in their soul? Or will they forge a new path entirely of their own making?

Safety tools: We will be using script change, lines and veils, and an open door policy. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best. This game follows The Gauntlet’s Inclusivity Policy.

Art is by Pretty Sleepy Arts.
